text:
In my logfile I am missing file location information.

when I compile my java application through make it works fine. But, when I 
compile my application through Ant, location information  is missing from my 
log file. In both cases I am NOT using -O option.
I even tried to disable JIT.
creator: pahuja@inautix.com
pahuja@inautix.com
text:
In my logfile I am missing file location information.

when I compile my java application through make it works fine. But, when I
compile my application through Ant, location information) is missing from my
log file. Instead (Unknown Source) is logged . In both cases I am NOT using -O 
option.
I even tried to disable JIT.

The extraction of location information is done on a best effort basis. It may 
not always work.
creator: ceki@apache.org
